author: Gnosis
title: Gnosis Safe
shortDescription: The Gnosis Safe is a multi-signature smart contract wallet that allows users to define a list of owner/signer accounts and a threshold number of signers required to confirm a transaction.
description: The Gnosis Safe is a multi-signature smart contract wallet that allows users to define a list of owner/signer accounts and a threshold number of signers required to confirm a transaction.

author: Multisender
title: Multisender
shortDescription: This dApp allows users to efficiently send thousands of tokens to multiple addresses by batching the transfers and automating the process. This tool enables users to save time by automatically generating transactions using MetaMask or other smart wallet software. Multisender is also completely safe in terms of account security since private keys and other sensitive data are all handled by the user's wallet software.
description: This dApp allows users to efficiently send thousands of tokens to multiple addresses by batching the transfers and automating the process. This tool enables users to save time by automatically generating transactions using MetaMask or other smart wallet software. Multisender is also completely safe in terms of account security since private keys and other sensitive data are all handled by the user's wallet software.

author: Symmetric
title: Symmetric
shortDescription: Symmetric is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) and a Decentralized Exchange (DEX), running on the Celo and Gnosis networks. Symmetric’s includes further development of use-cases (such as a launchpad, crypto index funds, crypto ETFs & ESG funds) and support for more networks in the future.
description: Symmetric is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) and a Decentralized Exchange (DEX), running on the Celo and Gnosis networks. Symmetric’s includes further development of use-cases (such as a launchpad, crypto index funds, crypto ETFs & ESG funds) and support for more networks in the future.

author: xDai Bridge
title: xDai Bridge
shortDescription: xDai Bridge is the official bridge dedicated to transferring Dai from Ethereum into xDai on Gnosis Chain. It uses a set of trusted validators to confirm deposits for a Lock-Mint swap.
description: xDai Bridge is the official bridge dedicated to transferring Dai from Ethereum into xDai on Gnosis Chain. It uses a set of trusted validators to confirm deposits for a Lock-Mint swap.

author: Omni Bridge
title: Omni Bridge
shortDescription: Omni Bridge is the official bridge of Gnosis Chain. It uses a set of trusted validators to confirm deposits for a Lock-Mint swap.
description: Omni Bridge is the official bridge of Gnosis Chain. It uses a set of trusted validators to confirm deposits for a Lock-Mint swap.

author: Curve
title: Curve
shortDescription: Curve is a popular automated market maker (AMM) platform that offers a highly efficient way to exchange tokens while maintaining low fees and low slippage by only accommodating liquidity pools made up of similarly behaving assets.
description: Curve is a popular automated market maker (AMM) platform that offers a highly efficient way to exchange tokens while maintaining low fees and low slippage by only accommodating liquidity pools made up of similarly behaving assets.

author: HoneySwap
title: HoneySwap
shortDescription: HoneySwap Exchange is a decentralised exchange deployed on the xDai chain.
description: HoneySwap Exchange is a decentralised exchange deployed on the xDai chain.

author: Sushi
title: Sushi
shortDescription: SushiSwap is a blockchain protocol running on Ethereum that seeks to incentivize a network of users to operate a platform where users can buy and sell crypto assets.
description: SushiSwap is a blockchain protocol running on Ethereum that seeks to incentivize a network of users to operate a platform where users can buy and sell crypto assets.

author: Bao
title: Bao
shortDescription: Stake Sushiswap and Baoswap LP tokens to earn BAO!
description: Stake Sushiswap and Baoswap LP tokens to earn BAO!

author: Component
title: Component
shortDescription: Component aims to provide flexible pool settings suitable for any token project, freedom of pools creation, and fair community protocol governance token distribution.
description: Component aims to provide flexible pool settings suitable for any token project, freedom of pools creation, and fair community protocol governance token distribution.

author: PoolTogether
title: PoolTogether
shortDescription: PoolTogether is a prize savings protocol, enabling you to win by saving.
description: PoolTogether is a prize savings protocol, enabling you to win by saving.

author: Omen
title: Omen
shortDescription: Omen is a fully decentralized multi-chain prediction market platform built on the Gnosis conditional token framework.
description: Omen is a fully decentralized multi-chain prediction market platform built on the Gnosis conditional token framework.

author: Swapr
title: Swapr
shortDescription: A governance-enabled automated market maker with adjustable fees.
description: A governance-enabled automated market maker with adjustable fees.

author: NiftyChess
title: NiftyChess
shortDescription: There are more possible games of chess than atoms in the universe. NiftyChess is a way to save any game of chess ever played.
description: There are more possible games of chess than atoms in the universe. NiftyChess is a way to save any game of chess ever played.

author: NiftyInk
title: NiftyInk
shortDescription: Nifty Ink is a platform to convert your digital drawings into limited-edition NFTs.
description: Nifty Ink is a platform to convert your digital drawings into limited-edition NFTs.

author: Cargo
title: Cargo
shortDescription: A view function that returns the creator address. The creator is initially set to the wallet address which deployed the smart contract via Cargo. burn(tokenId).
description: A view function that returns the creator address. The creator is initially set to the wallet address which deployed the smart contract via Cargo. burn(tokenId).

author: Unique.One
title: Unique.One
shortDescription: Next Generation, Decentralised Art NFT Marketplace by the community for the community.
description: Next Generation, Decentralised Art NFT Marketplace by the community for the community.

author: Cold Truth Culture NFTs
title: Cold Truth Culture NFTs
shortDescription: Cold Truth Culture is a community that works together to build something truly special. It’s a safe place in crypto space for people to hang out, talk and learn about digital assets, NFTs, share ideas, share artwork and reward people that contribute to our ecosystem.
description: Cold Truth Culture is a community that works together to build something truly special. It’s a safe place in crypto space for people to hang out, talk and learn about digital assets, NFTs, share ideas, share artwork and reward people that contribute to our ecosystem.
